name: Universe simulator (itch)
description:
Universe simulator gravity not included  [Prototype]

This game was made in one week for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

Become a newborn planet, eat asteroids, become larger, eat smaller planets, become larger ... and finaly become a black hole! 

This is my first public game project. It's main feature - gravity - is not included as my first experience with rigidBodies in unity didn't end up very well. Despite many problems I tried my best to make something playable and someday we may see fully functioning "Universe simulator - gravity included".
